column2:
Dear [GetMrMrsMiss] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName],
 it must surely have come to your attention that we live in uncertain times. As I care for your well-being I want to make you an offer: I will extend my protection over you, in exchange for a small contribution to our prosperity on your part.
 It's really an offer you can't refuse.
 With kind regards,
 [FromFrom.GetDynName]
I will not be extorted by [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName]'s goons!

Dear [GetMrMrsMiss] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName],
 I was deeply impressed by your recent message. I will make sure to arrange for the payments you demand.
 Yours truly,
 [FromFrom.GetDynName]

Sending a vaguely intimidating letter to [Root.GetDynName] might make [Root.GetHerHim] pay us a share of [Root.GetHerHis] income. If [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] doesn't react, we will have to fight a war.
